item.title: Ukrainian drone attacks on oil refineries have some Russian regions running on empty

item.title: Edmunds: Five big mistakes you need to avoid before buying your next new car
item.description: A 2025 analysis from Edmunds reveals that nearly 20% of new car buyers are committing to monthly payments of $1,000 or more
